[[File:Jabez Olssen.png|thumb|250px|Olssen in the special features of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.]]

'''Jabez Olssen''' ([[5 August|August 5]], [[1975]]) is a New Zealand film and television editor. He has extensively worked with [[Peter Jackson]], and was the editor for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. He also worked as an assistant editor for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', and an additional editor for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.

==Roles==
* '''[[2013]]''': ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - "[[Fish Monger]]"

==Awards==
* [[2002]] - '''[http://www.ofcs.org/ Online Film Critics Society Award]''', Best Editing, with Michael J. Horton, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''
* 2002 - '''[http://www.lvfcs.org/ Las Vegas Film Critics Society Award]''', Best Editing, with Michael J. Horton, ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers''
